reasoning: After comparing both screenshots, I noticed the layout issue with the two cards. In the incorrect design, there is no vertical padding above and below the card section, making the cards appear directly against the top and bottom borders. In the correct design, there is proper vertical spacing (padding) around the cards. Looking at the CSS, the issue is in the 'twoCards' class where the padding-top and padding-bottom values are set to 0px, but they should have some value to create the proper spacing.
